name: PayPal Se Belgian Branch
bossPosition: Head of SMB & Partners, Benelux & Ireland
goal: Founded in December 1998, PayPal is the leading global online payment company with more than 218 million active registered accounts. PayPal Europe is headquartered in Luxembourg, where it has acquired a banking license in 2007. PayPal enables any individual or business with an email address to securely, easily and quickly send and receive payments online. PayPal's service builds on the existing financial infrastructure of bank accounts and credit cards and utilises the world's most advanced proprietary fraud prevention systems to create a safe, global, real-time payment solution.
interests: Competition, Consumer Affairs, Customs, Economic and Financial Affairs, Enterprise, Financial Stability, Financial Services and Capital Markets Union , General and Institutional Affairs, Home Affairs, Information Society, Internal Market, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Research and Technology, Taxation, Trade
euInitiatives: Digital issues and payments-related legislation and policy initiatives, such as the DSM strategy, PSD2, AML, e-Money, eID, payments security discussions, FinTech, etc.
